description: These beef and black bean burritos make for a quick and healthy Mexican inspired dinner.
keywords: Burrito,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Tomato,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Black Bean Burritos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, red and green, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and fry the beef mince, diced onion and capsicums for 5 minutes. Add the garlic, spices and crumbled beef stock cube and cook for 2 minutes.

Stir in the black beans (including the liquid from the can) and chopped tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Add half a can of water and cook for 20 minutes until thickened, stirring occasionally. Squeeze in the lime juice and stir.
Heat the rice according to pack instructions and cook the tortillas for 30 seconds in the microwave.
Spoon chilli mix into the middle of each tortilla, add rice and any other toppings you like, fold over each end, roll up and serve.
